title: Mini-Ep 249: Rugged and Jugged
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 249: Rugged and Jugged
itunes:subtitle: Kate wears her Kirkland Signature sweatshirt to applause at a Phish concert and Doree cheers on her Peloton Zone Age team Forever35000BCE. Then, they hear from listeners about great sports bras for D-cups, skincare for oily skin in a humid city, and a ...
description:
Kate wears her Kirkland Signature sweatshirt to applause at a Phish concert and Doree cheers on her Peloton Zone Age team Forever35000BCE. Then, they hear from listeners about great sports bras for D-cups, skincare for oily skin in a humid city, and a passport photo app. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
